TEXT.TITLE: JORDAN TENDERING FOR U.S. WHEAT - EXPORTERS
TEXT.BODY: Jordan will tender Monday for 225,000 tonnes of U.S. hard and soft wheat under the USDA's Export Bonus program for April through November shipment, private export sources said. Reuter
